name: corridor z (itch)
description:
This project is still in major development. This mini-demo has just 4 levels. Let me know what you think. How does player movement and game feel check out for you?

Things to know - 

You will die on 1 hit with an enemy or obstacle. This may change with the addition of a health bar in the future. 

There is currently no timer. Tat will come later.

If you have a question just ask.
